markdownRemark.html:
This post and other posts in the series is mostly targeted towards landing a job at FAANG companies as a new grad / intern software engineer. When I refer to “FAANG”, I’m referring to various other tech / fintech companies as well such as Uber, Lyft, Airbnb, LinkedIn, Bloomberg, Citadel, Two Sigma, Stripe, etc.

As you probably know, technical interviews are somewhat notorious for determining potential hires for a company. Often times, they require

frontmatter.description: An introduction to technical interviews for target companies, in addition to criteria that recruiters are looking for when selecting interviewees.
frontmatter.title: Preparing for technical interviews (introduction)
